name: Bun Escape [RESET]
description:
Bun Bun is shaken awake by strange tremors. 

Upon leaving her little room, she discovers her home is now rife with danger and everything is falling apart!

Help Bun escape her crumbling burrow!

----

This is a remake of my first completed game, Bun Escape.

Bun has a few new moves in this version, and there are many new obstacles to avoid and levels to traverse.

As of now this project is finished! Updates will occur as needed, when I find bugs or manage to make some better music, but for now it's as done as it's going to get.

I hope you enjoy it!
